full_title: AMAZON BASICS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 4kg Pair (2 x 4kg), Light Grey Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Roll Design & Easy-Grip Texture, Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.strategy: Integrated top-volume keywords 'dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights dumbbells set', and 'dumbbell set' into natural phrasing. Included verified product features (hexagonal shape, anti-roll, easy-grip) and used 'for women and men' to capture gender-specific search terms. Maintained clean weight formatting and brand prominence.
